title: MSBuild on Mono on *nix incorrectly resolves relative paths in <Reference Include=...
body:
It appears that MSBuild is resolving relative paths from the MSBuild GAC or targets directory instead of relative to the project file which includes the Reference.

This is when using Microsoft.Build.Mono.Debug.14.1.0.0-prerelease.

nodes.body: @radical can you tell me if this issue should be investigated?
